琉球.definition: Ryūkyū; refers to the Ryūkyū Islands 琉球群島|琉球群岛[Liu2 qiu2 Qun2 dao3] stretching from Japan to Taiwan; Liuchiu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

琉球歌鴝.definition: (bird species of China) Ryukyu robin (Larvivora komadori)

琉球海.definition: Ryūkyū Sea; refers to the Ryūkyū Islands 琉球群島|琉球群岛[Liu2 qiu2 Qun2 dao3] stretching from Japan to Taiwan

琉球群島.definition: Ryukyu Islands; Okinawa 沖繩|冲绳[Chong1 sheng2] and other islands of modern Japan

琉球角鴞.definition: (bird species of China) Ryukyu scops owl (Otus elegans)

琉球鄉.definition: Liuchiu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan

琉璃塔.definition: glazed tile pagoda; glazed tower of minaret

琉璃藍鶲.definition: (bird species of China) Zappey's flycatcher (Cyanoptila cumatilis)
